q: Google wants to avoid long EU battle Google Inc wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. Allen Iverson had 40 points and 10 assists, and Chris Webber scored 19 points for Philadelphia, which has lost four of five. "Our Silver Perspectives enrichment program offers travellers interesting journeys hosted by noted historians, political analysts, bestselling authors and other esteemed experts," said Steve Odell , Silversea's senior vice president Asia Pacific. And many of these voyages will feature several guest lecturers teaming up to host a broad range of entertaining and enlightening presentations on a single itinerary. One such sailing with multiple guest speakers is Silver Spirit's 15-day, Dubai-to-Athens World Cruise Segment 5109, departing April 18. She went on live television and drank vodka. The actress appeared on the` Late Show With David Letterman ' on Wednesday. David Letterman asked her what Betty White 's hobbies are now. David Letterman asked her, What do you like to do in your free time. She replied, "Oh I like to do most anything, play with animals mostly and uh Vodka is kind of a hobby. And as if the moment couldn't get any more scripted, David Letterman pulled out two glasses with ice and vodka. Betty White drank out of the cup as David Letterman drank out of the bottle.
